product.name: Azalea
product.instructions: Large double. Good grower, heavy bloomer. Early to mid-season, acid loving plants. Plant in moist well drained soil with pH of 4.0-5.5.

product.name: Tibouchina Semidecandra
product.instructions: Beautiful large royal purple flowers adorn attractive satiny green leaves that turn orange/red in cold weather. Grows to up to 18 feet, or prune annually to shorten.

product.name: Hibiscus
product.instructions: Blooms in summer, 20-35 inches high. Fertilize regularly for best results. Full sun, drought tolerant.

product.name: Plectranthus
product.instructions: Quick-growing, herbaceous, shrub reaching up to 30 inches in height, forming a rounded, dense bush.

product.name: Camellia Japonica
product.instructions: Slow growing, upright to spreading shrub. Oval, glossy, leaves and profuse winter to spring blooming flowers.

product.name: Bougainvillea Spectabilis
product.instructions: Thorny woody vine scrambles over other plants with their hooked thorns. Pest free.

product.name: Rosa
product.instructions: Deep purple colored flowers bushy rounded growth habit to 3 feet tall. Plant in full sun. Water regularly.

product.name: Rosa
product.instructions: Deep purple colored flowers bushy rounded growth habit to 3 feet tall. Plant in full sun. Water regularly.

product.name: Bonsai Tree
product.instructions: They do not thrive indoors, where the light is too dim, and humidity too low, for them to grow properly.

product.name: Calibrachoa Noa
product.instructions: Blooms continuously from early spring to first frost. Full sun or part shade, moist well-drained soil.

product.name: Cymbidium Aestivum
product.instructions: The flowers last about ten weeks. They have a waxy texture and reach a height of more than 20 inches.

product.name: Brassica Oleracea
product.instructions: Creamy-white centers, medium green outer foliage with flattened outer foliage.

product.name: Viola Penny Orange Jump Up
product.instructions: Compact mounds of colorful dainty flowers, good for window boxes. Fertile well drained soil.

product.name: Cotula
product.instructions: Cotula have very fragrant orange flowers that bloom in the middle of summer.

product.name: Pelargonium Peltatum
product.instructions: Well drained neutral to slightly acid soil, bright light. Do not over-fertilize or these flowers will lose scent.

product.name: Pansy Blue Shades
product.instructions: Compact mounds of colorful dainty flowers, good for window boxes. Fertile well drained soil.

product.name: Pansy Yellow with Blotch
product.instructions: Compact mounds of colorful dainty flowers, good for window boxes. Fertile well drained soil.

product.name: Phalaenopsis Purple
product.instructions: Choose the brightest windows in your house for your orchids, place on an humidity tray and spray regularly.

product.name: Dianthus
product.instructions: They thrive in fertile, fast draining, slightly alkaline (pH 6.75) soil. Avoid overwatering.

product.name: Chrysanthemum
product.instructions: Chrysanthemums respond to plenty of food and moisture, and prefer full sun.

product.name: Armeria Alliacea
product.instructions: Summer flowering, 12–18” high, likes full sun and well drained soil. Drought tolerant.

product.name: Salvia Splendens
product.instructions: Grows to 15 inches. The species is easy to grow from seeds or cuttings. This species prefers full sun.

product.name: Agapanthus
product.instructions: Easily grown, tolerant of drought and poor soil, flower and foliage improves with feeding. Full sun.

product.name: Iris Sibirica
product.instructions: These plants are very hardy, easy to grow, and increase readily. Average flower size is 3-4 inches in diameter.

product.name: Chrysanthemum
product.instructions: Chrysanthemums grow best and produce the most flowers if they are planted in full sunshine.

product.name: Senecio Cineraria
product.instructions: Grown primarily for its attractive silvergray foliage rather than its yellow flowers. Drought tolerant.

product.name: Red Cactus
product.instructions: Add water until there is half inch of dry soil on the surface. Do not water again until the soil is completely dry.

product.name: Aloe Vera
product.instructions: Drought tolerant, well drained soil. Prefers full sun.

product.name: Schlumbergera
product.instructions: Easy to care for, requiring watering only when they’re dry. They like bright but indirect light.

product.name: Senecio Rowleyanus
product.instructions: Locate it in a place where it is exposed to at least a few hours of direct sunlight.

product.name: Lithops
product.instructions: These plants blend in among the stones as a means of protection. Grazing animals would otherwise eat them.

product.name: Pachycereus Marginatus
product.instructions: The Mexican Fence Post will eventually reach 20 feet tall. Protect the growing tips with Styrofoam cups on the tops.

product.name: Echinocactus Grusonii
product.instructions: Growing as a large roughly spherical globe, it may eventually reach over a meter in height after many years.

product.name: Opuntia Falcata
product.instructions: The plants should be kept almost completely dry during the winter months, once a month should be fine.
